welcome: writen by [BSimjoo](https://github.com/bsimjoo) and this is a default message\.
*Owner can edit this message in strings\.json file*
group-intro: wrote by [BSimjoo](https://github.com/bsimjoo) and this is a default message\.
*Owner can edit this message in strings\.json file*
owner-help:
/gentoken Crate one-time token to add new admin
/log_updates toggle debug mode

`/log_updates` is available just if you set debug as true in server configuration.
admin-help:
/my_level  Check you access level

/state     Bot statistics

/listchats Get a list of all chats

/sendall   Send a message to all chats

/send_feed_toall Send last feed to all chats

/set_interval    Change the interval between each check for a new post
help:
Users help:
/last_feed Get last post of weblog

/help      Show this help
en-us.time-limit-error: Sorry, I can not answer you right now because of time limitation between two request, try again 2 mins later.
en-us.unknown-msg: Sorry, I can't chat with anyone right now!
en-us.edited-message: Sorry this bot can not handle edited messages, please resend your message
